schema.name: Healthyfied Camote Ham Eff

recipeInstructions.text: Peel the sweet potato, then grate it into thin strips.
Dice the ham into small, bite-sized pieces.
In a pan over medium heat, cook the grated sweet potato for about 5 minutes, or until it starts to soften.
Add the diced ham to the pan with the sweet potato and cook for another 5 minutes, until the ham is lightly browned.
Create a well in the center of the sweet potato and ham mixture. Crack the egg into the well, cover the pan, and cook for about 3-5 minutes, or until the egg is cooked to your liking.

schema.description: A Healthyfied Camote Ham Eff recipe that's perfect for anyone looking to enjoy a delicious, low-carb and low-sugar meal. This dish combines the natural sweetness of sweet potatoes with savory ham and a perfectly cooked egg for a balanced and nutritious meal ideal for health-conscious individuals.
